uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.cleaner

Class Cleaner

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.cleaner.Cleaner

  • public abstract class Cleaner
extends java.lang.Object
    The Cleaner class is used to clean the Statistics and Threats tables of the HBase instance of data older than a certain threshold.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static long minTimeStamp
      The timestamp corresponding to the earliest data to be retained.
      protected static int period
      The period of data to be retained in days.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static void cleanTable(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, java.lang.String tableName)
      The cleanTable method creates an HTable object using the passed arguments and then runs a scan of the table to be cleaned and populates a list of row to be deleted.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main method calls the cleanTable method on both the Statistics and Threats tables.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • period

        protected static final int period
        The period of data to be retained in days. Hard coded to a given value, but may be altered in the code.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • minTimeStamp

        protected static final long minTimeStamp
        The timestamp corresponding to the earliest data to be retained.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method calls the cleanTable method on both the Statistics and Threats tables.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments passed to the main method will not be used in execution.

      • cleanTable

        protected static void cleanTable(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
              java.lang.String tableName)
        The cleanTable method creates an HTable object using the passed arguments and then runs a scan of the table to be cleaned and populates a list of row to be deleted. These are then deleted from the table and the table is closed.
        Parameters:
        conf - The Configuration of the HBase instance which will be cleaned.
        tableName - The name of the table in HBase which will be cleaned.
